Package org.example.Strategy

Interface MovesStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
GermanStrategy, ItalianStrategy, SpanishStrategy
public interface MovesStrategy
Interface implemented by strategies with methods to check legality of the moves. Used in Strategy Pattern.

  • Method Details

    • getLegalMoves

      Movement[] getLegalMoves(Player player, Pawn[][] pawnsBoard)
      Function returning all legal moves that can be made by a player
      Parameters:
      player - which turn is now
      pawnsBoard - double array that contains pawns on every field
      Returns:
      array of all legal moves that can be done

    • getLegalJumpsFrom

      Movement[] getLegalJumpsFrom(int row, int col, Player player, Pawn[][] pawnsBoard)
      Function when we check if there are more jumps to make after first one
      Parameters:
      row - from we are checking if there are more jumps
      col - from we are checking if there are more jumps
      player - for which we check jumps
      pawnsBoard - containing pawns on all places at the board
      Returns:
      jumps that can be made from (row,col) position

    • addlegalJumps

      void addlegalJumps(ArrayList<Movement> moves, int distance, Pawn[][] pawnsBoard, Player player, int row, int col)
      Method checking possible jumps that can be made from (row,col) position and adding them to the array list
      Parameters:
      moves - array list of Movements for jumps that are legal to do
      distance - distance from (row,col) to the position we are jumping to
      player - for which we check jumps
      pawnsBoard - containing pawns on all places at the board
      row - from we are checking if there are more jumps
      col - from we are checking if there are more jumps

    • legalJump

      boolean legalJump(Player player, Pawn[][] pawnsBoard, int fromRow, int fromCol, ArrayList<Integer> betweenRows, ArrayList<Integer> betweenCols, int toRow, int toCol)
      Function checking if the concrete jump is legal
      Parameters:
      player - for which we check jumps
      pawnsBoard - containing pawns on all places at the board
      fromRow - row from we are making the jump
      fromCol - col from we are making the jump
      betweenRows - Array list of rows between fromRow and toRow
      betweenCols - Array list of rows between fromCol and toCol
      toRow - row to which are making a jump
      toCol - col to which are making a jump
      Returns:
      boolean value of if the jump is legal

    • addlegalMoves

      void addlegalMoves(ArrayList<Movement> moves, int distance, Pawn[][] pawnsBoard, Player player, int row, int col)
      Method checking possible moves that can be made from (row,col) position and adding them to the array list
      Parameters:
      moves - array list of Movements for moves that are legal to do
      distance - distance from (row,col) to the position we are moving to
      player - for which we check the move
      pawnsBoard - containing pawns on all places at the board
      row - from we are checking if there are a move
      col - from we are checking if there are a move

    • legalMove

      boolean legalMove(Player player, Pawn[][] pawnsBoard, int fromRow, int fromCol, ArrayList<Integer> betweenRows, ArrayList<Integer> betweenCols, int toRow, int toCol)
      Function checking if the concrete move is legal
      Parameters:
      player - for which we check the move
      pawnsBoard - containing pawns on all places at the board
      fromRow - row from we are making the move
      fromCol - col from we are making the move
      betweenRows - Array list of rows between fromRow and toRow
      betweenCols - Array list of rows between fromCol and toCol
      toRow - row to which are making the move
      toCol - col to which are making the move
      Returns:
      boolean value of if the move is legal
